result.execSummary:
The defendant Evelyn A Kadia was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Intentionally Falsify Health Care Record, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 146.83(4)(a).
  • Intentionally Falsify Health Care Record, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 146.83(4)(a).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Court ordered defendant to pay a fine of $1,500.00. $750.00 to be paid on COUNT 1 AMENDED, and $750.00 to be paid on COUNT 2 AMENDED.
Pay all costs, fees and surcharges. Provide DNA sample and pay DNA surcharge. DNA surcharge to be paid on both counts. All costs, fees, surcharges, and fines to be paid by 12/7/15. Failure to pay will result in a civil judgment.

records.addlTxt:
Certification of transcript of proceedings of PLEA/SENTENCING HEARING (EXCERPT) commencing 10-06-2015 received and filed. (9 Pages.)
Copy of transcript forwarded to Patrick Knight, 330 E. Kilbourn Ave., #1170, Milwaukee, WI 53202.

Plea hearing proceeded. 
Defendant sworn in.

As to COUNTS 1 & 2 as AMENDED-
Defendant was advised of constitutional rights and maximum penalties, waived all rights, and plead GUILTY.  Defendant examined as to the plea.  Plea Questionnaire/Waiver of Rights, Addendum, and Jury Instructions received and filed.  Stipulation by parties to the Criminal Complaint as a factual basis to sustain the plea.  Court found the defendant guilty.  Judgments of conviction entered.

Defendant Evelyn A Kadia in court with attorney Patrick J. Knight.  Thomas L. Storm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy court clerk ccp.
Case set for plea and sentencing hearing. Parties have reached a resolution in this matter. State placed negotiations on the record. State filed an Amended Information. Defendant charged as follows:

COUNT 1 - Falsifying a Patient Health Care Record, contrary to sec. 146.83(4)(a), 146.84(2)(a)3 Wis. Stats., an unclassified misdemeanor.

COUNT 2 - Falsifying a Patient Health Care Record, contrary to sec. 146.83(4)(a), 146.84(2)(a)3 Wis. Stats., an unclassified misdemeanor.

Defense counsel acknowledged receipt of the amended information and waived reading.

Defendant Evelyn A Kadia in court with attorney Patrick J. Knight.  Thomas L. Storm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Deputy court clerk ccp.
Case set for scheduling conference. Defense counsel has received discovery and an offer from the State and requested a plea and sentencing date. Case adjourned to Branch 25.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for October 6, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Evelyn A Kadia in court with attorney Patrick J. Knight. Assistant Attorney General Thomas L. Storm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Deputy court clerk ccp.
Case set for scheduling conference. In chambers discussion placed on the record. Parties are gathering additional discovery and request an adjourned scheduling date. Court will set meaningful dates on the next court date. Parties to advise the Court if they need additional time to gather discovery. Case adjourned to Branch 25.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 18, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Evelyn A Kadia in court with attorney Patrick J. Knight.  Robert H Storm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Parties request another scheduling date; need to meet with State's investigator and continue to review voluminous discovery.  Parties were advised that as of August 1, 2015, this calendar will be reassigned to the Hon. Stephanie G. Rothstein, Branch 25, in Room G55 of the Criminal Justice Facility.  Court granted joint request and ordered all terms and conditions of bail to continue.  Scheduling conference scheduled for August 6, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Evelyn A Kadia in court with attorney Patrick J. Knight.  Thomas L. Storm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Parties request another scheduling date.    Agreed Upon Request for a New Court Date is signed and filed.  Scheduling conference scheduled for July 9, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Evelyn A Kadia in court with attorney Patrick J. Knight.  Thomas L. Storm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Defense counsel requested another scheduling date to go over voluminous discovery.   Court ordered case continued before Branch 20.  Scheduling conference scheduled for June 16, 2015 at 11:00 am.

Defendant Evelyn A Kadia in court with attorney Patrick J. Knight.  Thomas L. Storm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Moroney, Branch 20.  Original Information filed.  Copy given to defense counsel who waived reading.  Defendant pled not guilty. Court ordered case adjourned for Scheduling Conference in Branch 20.  Scheduling conference scheduled for March 12, 2015 at 01:30 pm.

DEFENDANT WAS ORDERED BY THE COURT TO REPORT TO THE MILWAUKEE COUNTY JAIL (CJF) TO BE BOOKED AND RELEASED BY 3:00 P.M. ON  01-31-2015. IF THEY FAIL TO APPEAR A BENCH WARRANT WILL BE ISSUED FOR THEIR ARREST.

Defendant Evelyn A Kadia in court with attorney Patrick J. Knight.  Thomas L. Storm appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy court clerk cmt.
Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Moroney, Branch 20.
Defendant given a copy of complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  Case is adjourned for preliminary hearing in Branch PE.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for February 18, 2015 at 01:30 pm.
SUMMONS MAILED. DEFENDANT ORDERED INTO ROOM 221 SAFETY BUILDING ON 1/30/15 @ 1:15 PM
